entity.super_arrow_fight.meteor_rain_bul: Meteors are falling from the sky!
entity.super_arrow_fight.netherify_bulle: This area is turning into the Nether!
item.super_arrow_fight.normal_arrow.desc: An ordinary arrow with no special features
item.super_arrow_fight.spectral_arrow.de: An ordinary spectral arrow that glows the target
Deals direct damage to enemies and makes them glow
item.super_arrow_fight.creeper_bullet.de: Spawns a swarm of creepers on impact
item.super_arrow_fight.mining_bullet.des: Continues to dig into the terrain
item.super_arrow_fight.napalm_bullet.des: Burn a wide area on impact
Netherize the surrounding terrain on impact
item.super_arrow_fight.poison_mist_bulle: Releases a poisonous mist on impact
item.super_arrow_fight.tnt_bullet.descri: Explodes a short time after impact
item.super_arrow_fight.zombie_bullet.des: Spawns a horde of zombies on impact
lobby.how_to_play.line_1: Gather resources and buy projectiles from your team shop!
lobby.how_to_play.line_2:
You can't build from island to island.
You'll have to fight with bows.
lobby.how_to_play.line_3:
Your health regenerates slowly,
but taking damage will halt it temporary.
error.no_both_team.line_1: There are no player on either team
error.no_both_team.line_2: Each team must have at least one player to start the game

error.no_red_team.line_1: There are no player on the §c§nRed Team

lobby.message.how_to_end_spectator: Back to the lobby to exit spectator mode
